CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Care Facility relative to Aegis Medical Center?
SRP.A: Stellar Care Facility is {below} Aegis Medical Center in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Lumina Clinic relative to Summit Health Annex?
SRP.A: Lumina Clinic is {above} Summit Health Annex in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Summit Health Annex relative to Vitality Clinic?
SRP.A: Summit Health Annex is {above} Vitality Clinic in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patient visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Summit Health Annex}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aegis Medical Center}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Lumina Clinic's maximum Patient Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Lumina Clinic's maximum Patient Visits is in {1986}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Care Facility's maximum Patient Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Care Facility's maximum Patient Visits is in {2012}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 2001, did the total Patient Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total patient visits between 1986 and 2001 was {larger} than between 1994 and 2007.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2008, was the average total Patient Visits higher or lower than between 1989 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total patient visits between 2006 and 2008 was {lower} than between 1989 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 2006, did the total Patient Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1999 and 2007?
NC.A: The change in total patient visits between 1987 and 2006 was {smaller} than between 1999 and 2007.

NC.Q: Was the total Patient Visits in 1995 higher or lower than in 2012?
NC.A: The total patient visits in 1995 was {lower} than in 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Summit Health Annex} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aegis Medical Center and Meridian Health Post first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aegis Medical Center and Meridian Health Post first exchanged leading positions in {1989}.
